by.batseko.library.dao.user

Interface UserDAO


  • public interface UserDAO
    Interface describes the opportunity that data source provide to store and restore User entity

      • deleteRememberUserToken

        void deleteRememberUserToken(int userId)
                      throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException
        Delete access token of User in a data source. Throws LibraryDAOException if an error occurs while writing a user
        Parameters:
        userId - user's id which help find a user
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException - if an error occurs while writing a user

      • findAllUsers

        java.util.List<by.batseko.library.entity.user.User> findAllUsers()
                                                          throws by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException
        Retrieves and returns List of User's into data source. If no such users contains into data source returns emptyList collection
        Returns:
        List of User
        Throws:
        by.batseko.library.exception.LibraryDAOException - if an error occurs while getting a user

        Returns:

                                                         java.lang.String token)
